fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Mask: Choose a role to disguise as within the first phase of the game. You will appear to win with others according to the role you chose.
- Tough Skin: You are immune to Chaos factionâ€™s Night phase attack.
- Meticulous: You plant bombs by attacking people (including Redirect! and Retaliate!) who fail to defend. You will know at all times who has a bomb.
- Decimate: Once you have placed a bomb on everyone, you will automatically detonate *two phases after*, granted you live to the end of that phase.
- Panic: Everyone will know when you have no more targets to plant a bomb on.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Preparations: Gain a non-special card of your choice. [4 uses, 1 CD]
- Plant: Plant a bomb on a target of your choice. [2 uses]
- Rig: Choose a room. Anyone who plays a card in that room will be planted with a bomb. [1 use, Unique]
- Explosion: Deal 2 HP of unblockable damage at the end of the phase to 3 non-bombed players of your choice. [1 use, Unique]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank and Outsider King.
